fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Say "[person] rn:" and follow up with a gif that attempts to visualize what is going on in that person's head. If they show any sign of confirming that the gif is accurate, you will earn one point towards your goal.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may only attempt your ability twice a day. You may do it more, but it won't count towards your goal.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Get 4 people to confirm your emotion gifs.
